enb_long_title: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change: Twenty-Second Session of the Subsidiary Bodies
section_title: INTERNATIONAL SYMPOSIUM ON THE STABILIZATION OF GREENHOUSE GASES
sentences: This symposium, held from 1-3 February 2005, in Exeter, UK, sought to advance scientific understanding of and encourage scientific debate on the long-term implications of climate change, the relevance of stabilization goals, and technological options to reach such goals.
